sentence.Network_en: It imparted to the wearer a kind of sacredness, which enabled her to amid all peril.
sentence.Network_cn: 那红字赋予其佩戴者一种神圣性, 使她得以安度一切危难.

sentence.Network_en: What have i to do with sacredness of traditions, if i live wholly from within?
sentence.Network_cn: 要是我能够完全依靠自我来生存,那些神圣的传统习俗又与我何干 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Buddhist and hindu doctrine of nonviolence expressing belief in the sacredness of all living creatures.
sentence.Network_cn: 不杀生论,非暴力主义佛教和印度教的非暴力教义,表明所有生物神圣不可侵犯性的信仰.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 神圣 (Sacredness)亲爱的神，即我的本体: 既然我是我自己现实的创造者， 我愿把我的生活作为神圣的事件， 让它成为我的一种修炼…
真法有其“神圣性” （Sacredness）和“正义性” （Justice）。伪法没有“神圣性”或“正义性”。
sancire(L.), to render sacred 使成为神圣sacredness n. 神圣, 严肃sad masoch
新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... colourless 平庸的 sacredness 神圣不可侵犯性 awareness 意识.

the most important phenomenon in the world happens where sacredness of the heart meets the activeness of the intellect .发生在这个世界上的最重要的奇迹是当神圣的心与聪明才智相会。
just feel it . relax into it , and then you'll find that your sadness has its own sacredness .慢慢的感受它，让他放松，然后你会发现你的悲哀也有它自己的尊严。

small wonder that confidence languishes , for it thrives only on honesty , on honor , on the sacredness of obligations , on faithful protection , an on unselfish performance ; without them it cannot live .难怪信心在减退，因为只有诚实、荣誉感、神圣的责任心、忠贞的维护和无私的作为才能鼓舞信心；没有这一切，

entry.def: Something that is sacred is believed to be holy and to have a special connection with God.

example.ex: The owl is sacred for many Californian Indian people.
example.tran: 对于很多加利福尼亚的印第安人而言，猫头鹰是圣物。

entry.tran: 宗教的;用于宗教仪式的
entry.def: Something connected with religion or used in religious ceremonies is described as sacred .

entry.tran: 不可侵犯的;不容干涉的;不可变更的
entry.def: You can describe something as sacred when it is regarded as too important to be changed or interfered with.

example.ex: He said the unity of the country was sacred.
example.tran: 他说国家的统一神圣不可侵犯。

auth_sentence.content: I believe in the sacredness of the river, but for me, it's enough to see it.
auth_sentence.res_content: I believe in the sacredness of the river, but for me, it's enough to see it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I believe in the sacredness of the river, but for me, it's enough to see it.

auth_sentence.content: It seems people bristle at even the subject of sacredness, which has itself been imbued with sanctity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems people bristle at even the subject of sacredness, which has itself been imbued with sanctity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems people bristle at even the subject of sacredness, which has itself been imbued with sanctity.

auth_sentence.content: Being sensative to the sacredness, if you will, of these terms is activity yet to be discovered.
